title: Alcohol: a new focus
creator_credit: American Educational Films, Directions Unlimited and Noel Nosseck
brief_description: Points out that everyone, at some time in his life, has to decide whether or not to drink, how much to drink and under what circumstances. Looks at the historical facts of the temperance debate, drinking traditions and effects of alcohol on the body. Builds up a case against unwise drinking habits. Narrated by James Brolin.
